Mathematics and any two (2) of Physics, 
Chemistry, Biology, Economics and Geography.  
l) SURE-POLY requires ‘O’ level passes in  
Mathematics Physics and any other subject.

in English Language Mathematics, Physics and/or 
Chemistry and the remaining one or two (2) 
credit(s) from the following: T/Drawing, Clothing 
and Textile, Biology or Agricultural Science, Basic 
Electronics and Economics.
